Teemo main here. He is "The Swift Scout" but in my opinion he really lacks the most important part of being a "scout", which is escapability. In my opinion the problem is an identity crisis with his passive and shrooms. 

His passive: The attack speed buff is unnecessary in my opinion and I would prefer movement speed and tenacity instead.

His shrooms: I would rather have reduced damage in favor of more utility.  The increased range on shrooms was nice because I could toss into bushes safer, not so much because I could throw into team fights.  Right now I don't feel there is a balance between the utility and ward aspect of his shrooms and the team fight usefulness.  I would rather see the shrooms _**deal**_ _**less damage to enemy champions**_, deal _more damage to minions_, _apply a stronger slow_, and _apply a reduction to incoming damage_. 

This allows Teemo to kite better, run faster, escape easier and deal less damage which in my opinion is far more consistent with the "scout" title.  

I can happily go into more detail if prompted.  I have a radical idea for his shrooms that I feel would truly make him unique and special.

please do enlighten us.

personally i do sorta what you did back in season 5 building lots of movement speed items and attack speed making shrooms purely utility and be a basic split push bot to varying degrees of success.

My feeling and the way I have always felt he is best utilized is the "get in an get out philosophy." Split push hard using shrooms as ward and defense setup. Chunk a big part of the turret, and sprint far away when you see someone coming. Rinse and repeat. Force the enemy team to send at least 2 champions after you and create a team fight advantage for your allies. Pretty much impossible in this current patch due to shrooms having a short lifespan, high mana cost, and average CD.  And of course because of the new vision changes in particular the red trinket.  

My build starts similarly with {{item:1306}} in most instances.  {{item:3085}}  is of course still great for split pushing.  I don't like {{item:3742}}, as an auto attack based champion you will almost never gain the passive.  I actually don't like that item on anyone except for {{champion:27}}  because I value the consistency of my movement speed and don't do well adjusting to the fluctuations.  It is the same reason I never use {{item:3117}}. Just a personal preference there.

Rework him into a less annoying champ. He can shroom all day long but remove half of the damage so that he can use a buffed q and/or e (maybe a new w) to deal damage. Otherwise you're encouraging players to keep annoying others with Teemo's current cowardly play style. 

His lore makes him out to be the deadliest soldier around, but he plays like a little trickster brat. Make him a real man's champion.

In fact here's a simple fix I can think of without coming up with new moves. Make his passive give more AS, his e give lower base damage but better ratios for full AP builds, and allow him to shroom more at lower mana consumption but also with lower damage. 

Add a mechanic where shrooms mark enemies and enable him to deal more damage with his other basic skills and autos. If not that, let shrooms mark enemies so Teemo can hit them from further range. I don't like that second idea as much since it encourages kiting, which again encourages a cowardly play style. 

It's much better than losing 1/3 - 1/2 health to shrooms.
I agree on reducing his shroom damage.  I do enjoy chunking 2/3 of an adc's health with one shroom when I am super fed but I would be in favor of less damage if it meant more utility.

Honestly if anything, as someone who used to main Teemo as their first champion, his power should revolve around his shrooms. There's nothing more annoying than having a Teemo max E first and having a single Q drain your HP down to half. His passive makes him go invisible and his W makes him go faster. He's clearly a champion revolved around scouting and laying traps and catching people out by sitting in a bush as an ambush for that split pusher who overextended. Right now he just has to right click you and apply a DoT, but imagine if his DoT damage was nerfed and that power was put into his ult. What if he could put mushrooms in choke points to finish off enemies who escaped a fight? What if he could stall an enemy from joining a teamfight with a well-placed mushroom that slows? What if he could scout in the enemy jungle and on important objectives, secure vision, and escape? 

Granted, he can do those things already. But it feels like an after-thought instead of his kit revolving around those things. Instead it's just "Press Q when they get near you, when they attack a minion, or when they're running away with low HP." I'd love to see Teemo as more of a jungler. His entire personality kinda screams he belongs in the jungle to me.
